pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Scatter Plots with Marginal Density or Box Plots // Allows you to make clean, good-looking scatter plots with the option to easily add marginal density or box plots on the axes. It is also available as a module for 'jamovi' (see https://www.jamovi.org for more information). 'Scatr' is based on the 'cowplot' package by Claus O. Wilke and the 'ggplot2' package by Hadley Wickham.
